snippet: To comply with an order from a federal judge, Obama administration officials will collect about 2,000 work permit cards that were issued to undocumented immigrants after the judge halted the program.
abstract: Obama administration will dispatch officials to collect about 2,000 three-year work permits that were issued to illegal immigrants in error; follows strongly-worded order from Federal Judge Andrew S Hanen.
lead_paragraph: To comply with an order from a federal judge, Obama administration officials will collect about 2,000 work permit cards that were issued to undocumented immigrants after the judge halted the program.

headline.main: Texas: U.S. Will Seek Return of Work Permits
headline.print_headline: Texas: U.S. Will Seek Return of Work Permits
